subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Kevin Faulk caught a 15-yard go-ahead touchdown pass with 3 minutes 13 seconds left and Deltha O’Neal pulled in a juggling interception leading the Patriots to victory.
snippet: Kevin Faulk caught a 15-yard go-ahead touchdown pass with 3 minutes 13 seconds left and Deltha O’Neal pulled in a juggling interception leading the Patriots to victory.
